product_name: Sunday Afternoons Garden Hat - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a wide brim, soft texture and great sun protection, the women's Garden Hat from Sunday Afternoons keeps your skin shaded with style whether you work in the garden or walk the hills of Italy. 60% polyester/25% paper/15% cotton blend is naturally lightweight and breathable. UPF 50+ sun protection; 3 in. kettle-style brim with 1 in. upturn. Adjustable ribbon tie; interior grosgrain sweatband. Crushable and foldable for easy packing and travel. Sunday Afternoons Garden Hat can be spot cleaned and line dried. Closeout.
short_description: With a wide brim, soft texture and great sun protection, the women's Garden Hat from Sunday Afternoons keeps your skin shaded with style whether you work in the garden or walk the hills of Italy.
